question:
Which of the following things were added to COMAPS when it was restructured and modified in 2000– 2001?
1) pollution monitoring
2) liaison
3) regulation and legislation
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Ministry of Earth Sciences under The Government of India has been monitoring the levels of marine pollution along the coastline of the country using COMAPS. When it was restructured and modified in 2000– 2001 pollution monitoring; liaison, regulation and legislation; and consultancy services were added.
